Package com.ae2dms.sokobanfx.controller

Class PlayPageController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.sokobanfx.controller.PlayPageController
public class PlayPageController
extends java.lang.Object
This class controls all the events on the game Play page.
Since:
24 Oct, 2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Source code provided by UNNC COMP2059. Modified by Gaole DAI(20124917), scygd1@nottingham.edu.cn

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame​(java.io.InputStream inputGameFile, java.io.InputStream inputHighScore, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This method initializes the game by calling the reLoadGrid method.
      Parameters:
      inputGameFile - Input stream from a game file.
      inputHighScore - Input stream from the high score list file.
      primaryStage - The primary stage that displays the game.

    • setEventFilter

      public void setEventFilter()
      This method adds event filter to the window to handle click events between players and the program.

      including keyboard actions, mouse actions, scrolling actions, and other interactions between the user and the program
